statements: SELECT * FROM product_tracking WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM product_tracking WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM product_tracking ORDER BY location DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, location FROM product_tracking WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM product_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY product_name
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM product_tracking WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_name, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM product_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%Factory%' ORDER BY location
SELECT product_name, location FROM product_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%Store%' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM product_quantities ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_quantities WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_quantities WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_quantities WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_quantities WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT location_id, location_name, capacity FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM product_quantities WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity > 300
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, location_id FROM products ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses;
SELECT product_id, quantity_change, timestamp FROM stock_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, warehouse_id, timestamp FROM stock_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM warehouses INNER JOIN stock_history ON warehouses.warehouse_id = stock_history.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 AND location_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses
SELECT inventory_id, product_id, warehouse_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 10
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE location='London' AND quantity < 50
SELECT product_name, location_name FROM products JOIN warehouses ON products.product_id = warehouses.warehouse_id WHERE products.quantity > 50 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT warehouse_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM warehouses JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC

SELECT product_name, location_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.warehouse_id = locations.warehouse_id WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY location_name, product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouse_inventory GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT tracking_id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity_change, timestamp FROM product_tracking WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND location_id = 2;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 3;

SELECT product_name, product_tracking.quantity_change, product_tracking.timestamp, locations.address FROM products JOIN product_tracking ON products.product_id = product_tracking.product_id JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = products.location_id;

SELECT warehouse_inventory.warehouse_id, warehouse_inventory.product_id, products.product_name, products.quantity, warehouse_inventory.quantity FROM warehouse_inventory JOIN products ON warehouse_inventory.product_id = products.product_id WHERE warehouse_inventory.quantity < products.quantity ORDER BY warehouse_inventory.quantity DESC;
